description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Blobs is an action puzzle game. Catch the blobs and then fire them back at the invading blob army, but be careful they are only weak against blobs of the same colour.   Blobs includes three game modes, each with difficulty options, scoreboards and trophies!
description.short: Blobs is an action puzzle game. Catch the blobs and then fire them back at the invading blob army, but be careful they are only weak against blobs of the same colour.   Blobs includes three game modes, each with difficulty options, scoreboards and trophies!
